main event: A UFO was observed reflecting sunlight, appearing round and glowing with a bright metallic appearance, at an altitude of approximately 30,000 feet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes and was observed at a specific azimuth of 330 degrees,The object had no visible means of propulsion and left no trail or smoke,It was not considered a jet or balloon,Another report described a white bright object with an intensity greater than a five magnitude star,The object was last seen bearing 080 degrees after initially traveling easterly.
witness description: USNS Lt. George WG Boyce and possibly others
